note:
Moderator on soapbox.chamba.social
See: https://soapbox.chamba.social/about

Boosting/reposting a post does not mean that I agree with it.

Following somone does not mean I agree with any viewpoints.

soapbox.chamba.social encourages the following topics:
* Permaculture, sustainable agriculture and regenerative agriculture
* Solarpunk
* Self Reliance and Off-Grid living
* Intentional communities
* Indiginous communities
* Anarchy,agorism and autonomous zones
* Horizontal governance and sociocracy
* Anti-Tech and Neo-luddism
* Spirituality, Self Realization and Self Development
* Digital Liberty,Software Freedom, Self-Hosting, Decentralization and related topics
* Privacy, Security, OSINT, OPSEC and related topics
* Fablab, open source ecology and digital fabrication
* Libre AI, Mechanistic Interpretability, Libre AGI?
